title: Chimichito Recipe for Cinco de Mayo
description: Sam the Cooking Guy has a new take on a Chimichanga to celebrate Cinco de Mayo this year. By baking it, you get a delicious Chimichito! Thank you for watching.

asset.author: Bedbathandbeyond
asset.hookText: http://blog.bedbathandbeyond.com/bbb-recipe/celebrate-cinco-de-mayo-the-chimichito-recipe/ Sam the Cooking Guy has a new take on a Chimichanga to ...

transcripts: Cinco de Mayo is coming. And we're making a chimichito. In a bowl, combine cooked shredded chicken, jarred red salsa, and canned diced green chilies. Mix well. Warm a tortilla gently to make it a little more pliable. Then spoon some of the chicken mixture onto the tortilla. And roll it up restaurant-style, bottom over the filling, sides in. And then roll away from you. Place on a greased baking sheet, brush the top lightly with oil, and bake until golden, about 20 minutes. While it cooks, warm jarred enchilada sauce in a small pot. And when it's done, spoon some of the enchilada sauce on a plate, lay the chimichito on top, add some sour cream, a sprinkle of shredded cheese, and top with cilantro. So good, so easy, and definitely so fun. Happy Cinco de Mayo.
